place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text:
Update 8/22/24: Restaurant still providing superior customer service and tasty food. There has been a few menu changes, but overall almost flawless.

Perfect as always.
Super SLOW. The am drive thru is insanely slow. People are trying to get food and get to work but the employees have zero sense of urgency.

I love Panera... the summer is here and the summer salad strawberries, pecans and chicken is fantastic!  I arrived mid-day and it was hot. The receptionist offered me water right away. This  restaurant is one of my favorites!!

This is the second time visiting this location and the food was standard however I couldn't help but notice that the only other POC on staff kept finding reasons to come to the area where I was utilizing my computer.  She came to the area 6 times within 30 minutes which clearly indicated she was watching me. I'm so sick of the racism in this country.
I don't understand how a pre-prepared mediocre soup and salad can take 30 minutes.

Why have drive-thru parking spots for those big orders if you don't use them? I ordered on the app for a soft drink, and it's ready, but I sit in my car for over 10 minutes waiting. Ice = melted. This is constantly happening.
Wonderful, food delicious and right temperature and clear surroundings. Loved it  will go to  eat there again.
All good.  Ordered on the app and the food was ready minutes later. Everyone enjoyed their meal.
Peyton (blonde streak in her hair) was very nice and was a great communicator! She does at good job at Panera & is going to be successful at whatever she ends up doing with her life!
The manager is extremely rude. I will not be back considering there are plenty of options right next door in waverly.
They always leave something out of my order.  It is frustrating to have to double check and go back inside.
Everything is fine but they seem to always have a shortage of staff and everything seems like a dumpster fire

Update 3/31/2024:
I won't change the 5 star rating because I really enjoy Panera but the Rea Farms location has awful service. At least early morning they do. Waited almost 20 minutes for a bagel pack today. No greeting when entering, in fact no one acknowledged my existence until I was already waiting 10 minutes.  The manager refunded my money which is a nice gesture but they need to do better at this location. I can't even tell you how many times I've waited at this location for them to open the doors after 7am on Sunday. Gastonia will always be my go-to from now on.

Their bagels are surprisingly good. The cinnamon crunch bagel is a favorite. Great sandwiches as well. I highly recommend the tuna salad on sourdough. Always friendly service.

I love panera bread, but this location has the worst drive thru experience. In the morning it's very slow, it doesn't matternifnyou pre-order or not. Then there are times throughout the day when there is no one taking orders at the drive thru. There is never no sign up. Very bad customer service. The drive thru is thought to be for convenience instead its an inconvenience.
Although very short handed, Jeremiah went above and beyond ensuring everyone had great service! Can't thank him enough
Their drive thru can take 20+ minutes. Even longer.
Always a good experience in visiting this location.

This place is bad, it looks understaffed so that may be the issue.

It appears that the dining area isn't tended to and the messes just get left there.

Food is meh at best and assembled poorly (see pic).

Stop begging for 5-star reviews and invest to improve the dining experience and food quality instead.
Never appropriately staffed, be ready for long waits

Went through drive thru. Ordered chicken noodle soup in bread bowl. Got small cup of soup with bread. Went to eat the soup it was only broth. No noodles or carrots. Tried calling for 20min with no answer....

Not bad selections but very sorry to say /
PRICEY AND SKIPPY PORTIONS ACROSS THE BOARD!

I'm not coming back here.  This is the second time I have had a bad experience.  The first thing is that there are like 10 employees, Saturday afternoon and no one can place your order.  You can only make it yourself at the kiosks.  If you ask any employee something, they don't know.  Then the vibrator never vibrated.  My name never appeared on the screen and the food had been on the counter for about 5 minutes until I was to  look and it was mine.  They forgot the chips and the room was disgusting.  It was hard to find a clean table

Panera has really let their customers down in relation to service. Now, the restaurant is almost completely Kiosk-based. Customers are, for the most part, forced to order food as is, and then the staff is not present to support customers.  They miss a lot of sales when customers could be seeing the great baked goods while at the counter ordering.  Love the food, hate the lack of customer support.

Worst Panera I've ever been to. Always out of menu items. Mac & cheese has  large chunks of unmelted cheese, tuna salad sandwich was 98% bread with only a few tablespoons of tuna salad. For $10! I don't mind spending a bit more if the quality is good, but this location is just bad.
Love this Panera.  Excellent service every time I've been there including at the drive thru.
The best Panera in the state!!!!

I wish I could give a zero but I can't. I sat in the drive thru for over 30 minutes to pick up a sandwich! I've had this issue at this location before but was hoping it was a one-off thing. It is not and now reading the reviews I see I'm not the only one. Over priced, poor service, mediocre food.  I'm done!!  Horrible service!!

The breakfast souffle I purchased was good but the pecan twist must have been used to hammer nails the previous day.  Stale and hard.  Microwave couldn't even save it.  Thought they baked these things fresh every morning??  Guess not

Over the last 6 months, the management team keeps making one bad decision after another causing this location to go from the best to the worse. Workers are not properly trained. Orders continue to be incorrect. Management can barely keep any staff, likely due to not paying workers enough money. No personnel are at the front counter to take orders. The last time here, it took the (minimal) staff 28 minutes to make 2 sandwiches.

This is the worse Panera Bread I've ever been too . The wait is horrendous and they never give you what you've  ordered. Ingredients are always missing off the sandwiches and they don't have the decency to tell you if they are out of something . They just give you whatever . I will no longer patronize this location .

Save yourself sometime and don't stop here specially if you're going to work. I stood in the drive thru for almost half an hour and there was only 2 cars ahead of me!!! I decided not to order this time since I wouldn't have time to eat it anyway.

They messed up our orders last 3 times we ordered takeout , as much as we love Panera this the worst place. It's pathetic, u come home after driving back and forth for 25 minutes and your vegetarian orders has meat so u can't eat it and end up fixing up something. Never going to this place
Didn't eat here just bought a gift card.... helpful staff
I needed help with an online order and the manager helped correct my mistake.  I appreciate the excellent customer service!

Went through the drive-thru, asked for a toasted bagel with cream cheese on it. Took 25 minutes and there were two cars in front of me. Then I get my bagel in a bag with one little container of cream cheese, no knife, no napkins, and this has happened every time I go to this one. I go to the one at Waverly will not again. What a joke
Horrible service they hung up the phone me
Online order was delayed by 60+ minutes, even though I received confirmation it was done. No one answers the phone. Front staff was very rude when I went in to check on the status of my order.

Ordered a sandwich with spinach and tomato added, didn't have either of those on it when I got home. Whole sandwich was also just sad and deflated. Mostly bread. This is one of many awful Panera visits I've had over the course of a year, and it's not just NC. I've been to several in different states and they're all subpar.
pretty average, slow service. dirty dining room
Very amazing place to dine at. A kind young man Alex Farino had greeted me and my friends, and had served us our order. Will be sure to come back again, very kind people.

Saturday night, 6:00 pm. Front counter closed. Need to use kiosk.
2 employees only seen in the kitchen. People backed up eating for food. Trash overflowing, drink station a less. Can't throw garbage away because receptacle is overflowing.
Good food and service.

Worst service Ever. We've been living in the area for a decade and unfortunately this location is a stones throw. Every time I visit I regret. Esp during evenings. Bunch of mostly white high school kids (boys) who act like brats. The kid today literally threw my bagel at me!!! And stared at me when I asked for a knife like I was speaking a foreign language. Food is general cold. Explains why it's always empty. Owner better pay attention to these reviews.

Panera always has great food but unfortunately the staff is not always pleasant at this location. One of the issues that I have seen is having someone as a cashier who becomes easily flustered and frustrated when it gets busy. I've experienced that and then it's taken out on me. I completely understand that restaurants get busy but the unpleasantness of the staff is an ongoing thing. I hope they fix it because it's the only Panera on this side of Ballantyne and the entire experience could be wonderful.

I have no idea how this Panera Bread is in business. Half the time they don't have the right type of bread or other ingredients to make commonly placed orders. And then if they do have items in stock, they typically screw up your order. If I was the owner of this Panera Bread I'd be embarrassed and get out of the service industry.
Receipt was correct but got home and sure enough the order was very wrong for the bagel type. Worst part is the even calling "between meal times" no one answers the phone.

Good food. I like to make iced coffee by buying a cold drink, filling the cup with ice  and then hot coffee. They have large size and small size items. The small are usually big enough. Some items come with your choice of an apple or potstoe chips. This place has a steady following.  Nearby, you can eat at Chuy's or Viva Chicken.

I totally messed up ordering to a different location and walked into this one after a CRAZY day. I realized the food wasn't there and I asked the manager on duty (who was clearly super busy maintaining his staff), if I could refund the other order and order for that location. He was so sweet and kind and I think could probably tell I had a day and helped me. I am a small business owner and always appreciate when people go out of their way to make others feel seen. Anyways, thank you to the manager for helping me fix my order. It made my day!
This place is oddly different than all other paneras I've been to...they should put it out of its misery and add another restaurant in its place. Wow
Got brocolli cheddar soup was pretty good also got a ham sandwich which was just okay. But the soup was hot and service was fast, I still say this place is over priced.

Just bought a chai late , it was only half filled .
Can't they even fill it up to the size.  . i pay  for the cup or the food

My last three drive-through experiences at this location:

1) closed during operating hours
2) seemingly open, drove through the line, no one ever answered
3) spent 38 minutes trapped in line trying to get my daughter Sam macaroni
This is the worst panera location. They mess up orders all the time. I never had problem with Panera at other location. This particular location doesn't keep up to panera standards.

This location sucks. I love Panera breads but this location needs to be shut down.I placed an order through Panera bread app  for 4 bread bowls. Only got two delivered paid for four of them and no one has picked up the phone.
Sukhimi bomba!
Not clean and food not fresh.

Panera located at 11630 Waverly Center Dr, Charlotte, NC 28277 I was surprised that there was no in person ordering and it was only ordered at the kiosk. To me that isn't ok at all! It puts workers out of work for me doing their job.
Kaleigh who cut my bread and handed me my order was very nice, but I want to be able to order at the front counter, not at a machine who can't answer a question not customize something.
Food was fresh and good. But keep that aspect of customer service alive.
This location is awful, they never get an order right and you wait on line for 20min to get your food.  If I can give a zero I would

Panera Bread usually has good service and good food. This particular location was understaffed with dirty tables and no one available to take orders. The kiosk is nice if you know the menu. I feel you spend more money when you use the kiosk. Anyway, I will not be going back to this location.

For some reason this location refuses to prepare items right.    I am constantly having to contact support for items missing.  For example, they have never given me the correct items with the French Onion soup.  They either forget the cheese or the croutons or sometimes both.  Not sure how hard it is to train someone properly, but apparently they havent.   They have done this when I have paid for extra cheese as well.

Go to the Ballantyne location, you will not regret it.

I've lost all faith in everything. Ordered a sandwich to be picked up through the drive through. Waited almost 10 minutes just to tell them I was here. Get the sandwich home and it's the completely wrong thing. There is a severe allergy to dairy which I put on the order and get home and there is cheese and chipotle sauce all over it. Extremely disappointing. Good thing we looked. Allergies are not anything to mess with!!

Yikes.  The people weren't rude or anything, but this is wuite possibly the worst Panera I've ever been to.  It used to be my favorite healthy fast food place, it feels like Panera' prices have increased while quality has decreased.

Came here today and was told there is a 45 minute wait to get food at the drive thru!  Left to go to a real restaurant for that kind of wait - the cost of inflation and the price of food is too high for that kind of poor service!
Understaffed, you will rarely find freshly made coffee and it's usually out, long wait to get your food and place is a mess.

We ordered using mobile app. It took five tries to order as lot of their ingredients were out. We waited 30 minutes at drive-thru excluding the time we waited until the food was ready. It's one line lane so we were stuck and people behind us were honking. The food was cold and we didn't get our Madagascar vanilla cold brew as they said the expresso machine was "broken". Asked for a refund but just told us to use the app which does not have the option to get one. Not one apology. Never returning to this location and I don't think I would be using Panera as soon as I use up the gift card.

Good place, when it's open. Problem is the dining room is always closed. Take out and drive through only. It's one thing if it's in off peak times, but we're talking smack in the dinner rush on the weekends .

Every time I go to the drive thru they can never fulfill my order,it's either they only doing online orders and pick up at the , or they short staff so my order will take over 20 to 30 minutes to get to me and I always leave there with nothing and end up going somewhere else. Which is sad because we love their food
Good quality food that's a bit pricey but you get what you pay for
Waited 30 min for food. Never happened. Manager wouldn't come out to give us a refund. Sent a new employee. Took another 10 min. Plus there AC wasn't working
Very disappointing service. Order was incorrect multiple times over multiple visits. They don't even answer calls.

This location is the worst Panera location I've ever been to. First of all, they're ALWAYS out of ingredients. What kind of sandwich restaurant runs out of tomato and pickles?? Secondly, when you go there through the drive thru, you wait like 3 hours for your food. Thirdly, I just ordered 2 turkey bacon bravo sandwiches and neither one of them have turkey on them. I tried calling the store multiple times to let them know and no one answers and I continuously get hung up on. Great job Panera Waverly. You're really making us proud. Get them out of there and put in a restaurant that can actually do their job.
How this place is still in business is one of the great mysteries. They are always out of items.  Severely understaffed and food quality is abysmal. AVOID AT ALL COST

THIS PLACE SUCKS. Never go here unless you want to have the Worst. Experience. Ever. First of all, I had to wait 30 minutes just to ORDER my food and there were only TWO cars in front of me. I ordered and then waited another 20 minutes to get to the cash register. When I finally got to the register, I asked him how long it would take to get me the food and the guy said that it shouldn't take that long, only about 10 minutes. 10 minutes???!!! That's a lot!!! He then asked me to my pull over to the parking lot so that I can receive my food there. You know what that means, waiting another 20 minutes. At that point, I didn't even want the food anymore, so I just left. I wasted an hour of my day just for nothing. I ended up getting Chick-fil-A and got it within 4 minutes. I recommend you to not waste your time. I also recommend you to never go here, unless you want to have a bad day and be hungry. Anyways, this place sucks, never going here again. Plus, they have really bad service, every time I go here they always forget something. Either a fork or a spoon, or even a whole soup. Go enjoy your day at Chick-fil-A, not at this terrible Panera bread that I abhor.

Panera has a variety of salads, soups, and sandwiches. Chipotle chicken avocado melt is the go-to sandwich with a bag of chips. The chipotle sauce brings out the chicken with just enough spice to give it a kick. After the chicken and chipotle sauce, the avocado and cheese blend is a nice touch. All that put on a toasted bread served warm. Can't beat it.
Sobre valorado para mi gusto, precios altos y cuando no disponen de algun articulo solo lo mencionan cuando tu orden deberia estar lista
This used to be my go to for quick, healthy food. It is now dirty and run down. The restrooms are hideous! Please fix!

Don't go to this Panera they are short staffed and sat in the drive thru twice for 25 minutes for one bagel !! Manager Kayla did not care at all! Corporate needs to come with better options when this happens ? Like close the drive thru for start !!  People are stuck one they are in the drive thru!! Was here at 2pm not even lunch or dinner time
Order gets messed up every tim

Placed a group order last night for lunch today for 13 people.  Per DoorDash, this location never attempted to prepare the order and then arbitrarily canceled the order with no reason given.  No call or notification.....just cancelled.  Only received info about what happened from the delivery driver.
Thee absolute worst Panera Bread I've ever been to.  They are always extremely slow, especially the drive thru.  Order ahead through the app or you will be waiting forever
Great

When they don't water down the soup, it's pretty good. It also really helps when they give you what you pay for, which is less than half the time you go through the drive through. Forget about calling them to make them aware as it just dead tones after 2 minutes of ringing. It's unfortunate but they push their customers to leave long lasting feedback in a review to be heard from simply, silly yet consistent mistakes.

Terrible food! The chicken noodle soup was all broth except for three carrots, a few tiny bites of chicken, and one piece of a noodle. The grilled cheese sandwich was burnt. Very disappointed with this location and will not return.

Had a great experience with this location today. I got home with my order and realized that half of a sandwich we had ordered was missing. I called in expecting to be told I would have to come back, due to a meeting I could not.

The girl who answered the phone was extremely friendly, apologetic, and helpful!

She asked me my address and had a full sandwich, 2 sides and 4 cookies DELIVERED to me free of charge.

It is rare to receive such great customer service!

We will be back.

What a lady place ; the whole stuff are just half asleep ... waited 7min for a naval to be toasted ?!?!
The area of picking up just stinks ; those floors have not seen a mop / disinfectant for years
The service needs to be improved. Pathetic.

I can never leave Panera without all of my food. I have to always check and when you don't check you don't get the food you ordered. Staff are very careless teenagers. When I was ordering they are very lazy and dismissive which leads to them forgetting food and not putting in my clear orders. Do not come
here.
clean restaurant
Great location. Quick service and great food. Staff was friendly and constantly kept all tables clean. Fast wifi is a plus
Basic Panera with good food. The service was lowkey slow. It took forever to get my meal out. My meal was checked by "top g" though hahaha"
A love this place!

I rarely write reviews but since I couldn't review in the app, I figured I'd come here. Paying $6 for a hot beverage (chai latte) to only get the cup filled halfway is very disappointing. Unfortunately, so is the bland flavor. This happens every time I order from this location here in Waverly. This never happens at any other location I go to.

I was refused services at this location tonight (03/12/2023), Panera was open, it was on or around 8:40. I had to get the attention of the workers and was then told to hold. The self-entitled bias prejudiced workers had one car at the window. They willfully did not take my order, and by the time the vehicle in front of me got their order and left, as I passed all the employees are standing around huddled in the middle of the floor doing nothing. This is a very prevalent attitude amongst young employees at various restaurants in the Waverly community. It is most unfortunate these damaging attitudes & behavior exist and seems to be thriving in the 21st century. #Panera Bread hold your employees accountable. Unfortunately, a negative star was not available.
Didn't have a lot of choices at the time I was there bakery
Love the Soups...
They charged me twice for two different amounts on one order, they have terrible service. Sounds like they need to re-staff the entire place.
Sandwich was good!

We've been ordering delivery for corporate meetings from this Panera for months, we get pretty much the same thing every time and it's always been good. Until today, zero silverware, zero napkins, and nothing was labeled even though we specifically and clearly marked and noted that meals should be labeled and cutlery and napkins were to be provided. I don't know if someone just didn't care or wasn't paying attention but it was terrible.

Ordered pick 2 with soup and sandwich. Opened the bag and there was no sandwich. The order was "checked" before being given to me, so I shouldn't have been missing anything. I was on my lunch break and didn't have time to drive back and ask for my sandwich, but I called and the store apparently doesn't have a working phone number.
Tried calling multiple times during open hours because my panera website placed delivery order was delivered missing items. No answer. No refund. No help. No accuracy.

Hard to imagine worse customer service, especially for delivery. We have given this particular Panera WAY too many chances to double check their orders before sending them out. We have finally written them off for delivery because every single time, items are incorrect and missing, often full entrees just not included. Then good luck trying to get in touch with them. They don't answer the phones much of the time.
I will always love Panera and Starbucks. Both apps are on my phone
Bought the bagel pack and blueberry bagels were rock hard. I did my pick up at 8 am so the only thing that makes sense I got bagels that are 3 days old (they were that dry)

I have had several issues with this particular location. I do a lot of mobile orders and the first issue has been the wait. I've had to wait long times for my order to be brought to me. I've dealt with things running out and replacements having to be done which I understand. What I don't understand was my most recent experience. I decided to go in and pick up my order because I figured it would be quicker than waiting for them. When I went to grab my order it wasn't there. I had to wait to find an employee since I wasn't acknowledged at all. They seemed confused and almost made me feel like I was in the wrong. They had to ask other employees where my order was. When I told the employee my name again she responds "oh we were out of Asiago that's why your order isn't there" we stared at each other for a minute and I proceeded to ask "well okay can I get something else" she replied "yeah go the front and they will get it". The cashier I had to deal with was a very sassy rude man. Seemed almost annoyed to have to assist me. I gave my selections and he put it in bag and was going to send me on my way. I asked for the cream cheese that I ordered which then he seemed even more annoyed that he had to go and retrieve that. On top of all of that I had to ask him for a knife. I don't want to make assumptions but I'm getting a bagel and cream cheese, a knife would be helpful. Being annoyed with this whole experience I asked him is their anything they can offer for the inconvenience. He replies "um no" in which I responded "really". He then hits me with "and what would you like me to do?" In the most rude and snarky way. I grabbed my stuff and just left. This is unacceptable. I know places are short staffed but hiring just anyone is going to hurt your business. I do not ever want to deal with the rude people that were working that day ever again. Which is a shame because I work in the area and it was nice to have an option for lunch that used fresh ingredients. Shame on you Panera. Be better.
ordered a pick two and they didn't give me my salad. got hung up on twice and when we called to ask for a refund :( not mad just disappointed

Went to the drive through this evening before going into work for Mac and cheese and a hot chocolate. The food was fine, but the hot chocolate has no chocolate. It's just steamed milk. I'm very disappointed but I don't have time to go back.
The customer service was really good. The tomatoes soup wasn't as good as it is at my local Alexandria, VA location. The soap wasn't as cheesy or flavorful. Still good but not like the soup I crave.

Everything was good. Only issue is the drive thru menu needs some work. Other than that, its what I expected. Online menu said you had ham & cheese on rye. Drive thru said no deal! So I got a chicken sandwich.
I love Panera unfortunately at this specific location they never seem to have anything I order so I end up leaving or selecting something other than what I came for .

Literally the worst Panera we've ever been to lol they mess up so badly every single time. Drivethrough workers are so rude, unhelpful and untrained. This location desperately needs a new manager/owner or entirely new staff. They're always out of several main menu items by 2pm. Please get it together y'all, i love Panera, but every time i come here we have to get something fixed/somethings missing and leave so aggrivated. For $50 for a family of 4 it's just not worth it.

They have healthy choices and the food is always good. It's pricey for fast food, but that's the trade off for higher quality. The reason they are not getting higher stars has to do with the service. I ordered in the drive thru and was told to park in curbside and they would bring it out. After waiting 10 min. I went inside. Apparently they gave my order to someone else. I had to wait for them to make my order again. I expected some compensation for my trouble, like a cookie or drink or something, but all I got was a mumbled "sorry about that".

I went through the drive through. It was quicker than others but they took longer than usual to get my order ready and forgot my sauce. Otherwise, the employees were super nice and was very apologetic about the length it took for my food to be ready.

Bad service.i was waiting for my order for while and didn't get all my order and then after waiting in the my car for another long time,I had to walk in to get rest of my order.i don't think I ever going back to this loction.
I waited in the drive thru 20 minutes for two hard and cold bagels, and they didn't even give my a spoon for my mac n' cheese after all that wait time.
I can't get enough panera. Great food and drinks.  Love the pick 2 combos.

Two women saved me a time of talking to the manager.  Also would have if I wasnt so busy.  No friendly greetings and very few smiles.  One employee just blank stared at me when I asked him for a straw twice and then he still didn't answer.  There were no straws at the drink area with the other coffee ingredients...
Dependable meals. Prices are a little high for  many of the menu items.
IT TOOK FOREVER to get out food they said to pull forward and we waited 25 min just for a cup of soup and 3 pieces of bread.do better panera.

The staff is almost always rude. When you go through the drive thru and only order a bagel and a drink they make you sit in the front parking lot for 15-20 minutes until they bring you your food. They just seem miserable.

Tuna sandwich wasn't on the bread i ordered and i asked for and paid for extra tuna salad and i barely got any tuna on my sandwich.. i tried to call and get them to fix it and no one would answer. Panera is too expensive to be messing with peoples lunch like this and then not care that you didn't even take the time to read the order correctly!
Food here is hit or miss. Employees are nice and helpful.

Good food, although staffing seemed a bit sparse, so the order for 4 people wasn't correct until a third try, but they were very apologetic and made good on the errors. Restaurant was clean and has ample dining inside and out and has convenient drive thru and curb service pick up.

The staff are very helpful and polite and know the job that they're doing, you have a vast amount of food and drink to choose from and the food is remarkable as well. Orders get prepared really nice and quick and all the items we had: the mac and cheese, tomato soup, mediterranean sandwich, warm bowls and the accompanying potato chips are unmistakably panera bread. One thing to know is that, just like all panera breads, is that there is a limited amount of vegetarian options which is a bit disappointing.

Visiting this place for last several years but their service has degraded over years. They eill always make you wait long in pick up spot for drive in Orders. Cofees are not warm. Plus they mess up your order. What's the point in going to druvein when you have to wait do long. Pathetic service. Shame on you panera bread.
They need to get the wasps by the drive through under control.   There has to be a large nest nearby
Can't be beat.
This is the saddest Chicken Salad Sandwich I've ever seen. There is little to no chicken salad actually on the sandwich. Embarrassing for Panera Bread
This is my steak sandwich....more like a bread sandwich with a piece of steak...waste of money....

Atmosphere 4 stars
Food (steak & white cheddar, lemonade) 3 stars
Technology  (broken kiosks) 1 star
Concept 5 stars
Service 4 stars
Nice kids working there.
The 3 guys that I interacted with were Super nice, especially the one who took our order. The food was very good and came surprisingly quickly.
The staff is friendly and helpful.
Great healthier alternative to fast food.

if i could leave no stars I WOULD! they never answer the phone, they always mess up my order every time it never fails, they threw my tuna sandwich in my bag and there's tuna everywhere, they have awful customer service! i love panera but this is the last time i will be coming to this location!
Great. Keep it p.
drive thru for had been a good experience in the morning , always so caring and respectful !
Online ordering and window pickup  services are excellent.

The nicest employees I've ever met! My cars battery died in this locations drive through. The employees graciously offered to help me push my car into a spot! After this they gave my meal for free even after trying to hand them my money! Great food and even better employees! Truly the best experience I've had in a while and will be coming back here!
The only problem was the machine I ordered on in the store would not take my card.   Even the staff member who tried to help had a problem with it.   Very annoying!

The staff is not polite. One of them is angry to me when I get back their meal with a piece of hair.
Our vegetarian salad contains some meat, the staff did not pay attention.
We were unhappy

Good food quick food however they were all out of almost of everything they didn't even have lids they say they're running in establishment nonsense... Half of the things say they're sold out when they're really not do better

Very happy with this Panera, always on time with our order and a friendly and helpful manager despite it being our mistake- thank you for understanding that we older folk are not always that technologically minded. Appreciated his help! Thank you!

Check out the photo -  I ordered a toasted bagel with cream cheese, cut up in quarters, through the drive-through.  Imagine my surprise when I opened the bag to find the bagel pieces just thrown in the bag.  Not wrapped, not even a napkin.  How is this considered proper food presentation?  Totally unacceptable.

Stopped going there because they kept forgetting items in my order, and it was terribly slow.  Decided to give them another try today, and guess what?  They forgot items in my order and it was ready for 15 minutes before they brought it out to the car.

This location needs new management. Every time i've ordered something it has been wrong, either drive thru or for delivery, and it's just not worth the effort to get it fixed. Almost every time i've gone through the drive thru, Ive been asked to pull around and park in the curbside pickup area and they would bring the food out. Ive never ordered more than 3 items in the drive thru, and the order was STILL wrong after they've made me wait. Too expensive for such poor service.
Terrible communication.  3 of last 4 orders were either missing sides or completely wrong and front counter is well understaffed. It shouldn't take 15 minutes to get a bagel and coffee
Pick up order was incomplete. Manager made no efforts to correct the issue.
I ordered four items and modified two of them online due to an allergy. When I picked up my order, those two modified items were wrong, so we couldn't eat them. I'm so annoyed.
For the third time in a row we've picked up an order to go and gotten home without everything we ordered. I can see one time as an accident, but three times? We won't visit this Panera again.

I got asked 4 times about what type of drink and 4 times told her sweet tea, and still was given Unsweetened tea, ordered a salad and they didn't include plastic ware to eat with, order a chicken sandwich of one kind and got a different kind. When you're on a timed lunch break there's no time to come back to argue or complain about poor customer service. This location continues to deliver less than desirable customer service. Pay attention to your customers Panera Bread.

I pre-ordered my food from here for curb-side pickup, and 40 minutes after they told me my food was ready, they brought it out. I would've gone inside to tell them I needed my food, but I wanted to see just how long it would take them to notice someone that's just been sitting in their parking lot for that long. The service here every time is absolutely ridiculous, and if I could rate less than a zero I would.

Always omit something on your online order.. More than once ordered Fuji chicken salad and did not get any chicken. The drive through is somewhat better, if certain people are on, but the wait time is incredibly long due to the kitchen.

This is the worst run Panera in the entire area. Corporate does not seem to care. It has been this way since opening.
Decent food and good bread but way over priced.
It's not clean, there are barely any outlets anywhere to charge devices while you work, and the service is bad.
Amazing
Ever since chak and David left the joint aint been the same! #paner

Absolutely disgusting I've worked in the service industry my whole life this place was nasty! Staff eating off the trays no gloves behind the counter. Ordered for 6 people grilled cheeses came out the cheese wasn't melted two people in the whole establishment and not a single table clean meanwhile the staff was eating. Sent a hot chocolate back refused to remake it said "nothing we can do" teenagers working behind the line starting screaming names so obnoxiously you could hear them outside.

I also come here and get the Asian Sesame salad. Along with mac and cheese with broccoli. I also love the Bear Claw. The food here is good and fresh. I so far have not run into any issues with this Panera Bread establishment. The service I get here is always good too.

I will post the picture of sandwich they made me. I ordered whole steak and cheese sandwich. You guys tell me if I am wrong. But I was hoping on something better than that. It's just plain bread. There is nothing on that sandwich. I paid for just bread

I had the worst experience at this Panera today. The online order wasn't ready at least 10 minutes after I was notified it was ready. The wild rice soup was too watery like leftovers with very little chicken and rice in it and they gave me one wrong soup and gave one small when I ordered big. The bagel was not sliced and toasted like I ordered. The service and quality of food has been very inconsistent at this location.
The worst drive through I've ever been in, just waited 20 mins and finally bailed; no way to even leave so I had to just wait another 10 to even be able to leave; never had good service here

They take forever on their drive thru! I waited 15 minutes today with only 2 people ahead of me and the 1st person was already at the pick up window before I got in line. I waited 30 minutes last week . I sat at the pick up window 6 minutes waiting for 4 bagels without anything on them. They do not butter the bagels in the store, they lightly run it through the toaster and then it's given to you cold! When I ordered the 4 bagels, I only asked for 1 to be toasted. They bagged the toasted bagel between the cold bagels . Not impressed!
When the Starbucks is packed, the Panera drive thru is a fast option.
The guy that helped me in the drive through was so nice and even helped me get my order for cheaper then normal!
Excellent
It's so frustrating that the coffee comes out different every single time that it's made because you never know what to order

Whenever I go to this location it seems like they are out of something, the person taking my order talks so fast that it doesn't sound like English, the water tastes wierd and is sometimes tinted pink, and I'm never guaranteed pumpkin seeds on my autumn squash soup. When I went today they gave me "water" that was light pink with a straw that had NO wrapper on it and the worker wasn't even wearing gloves!! My soup also didn't have pumpkin seeds on it.I was appalled by the lack of sanitation and chlorine-like water. This location needs to be better managed.

This is absolutely, without a doubt, the worst Panera I have ever set foot in. I ordered online and expected my food to be done once I got there (15 minutes after ordering a single bagel and a drink). I stood by the rapid pickup and watched the bag with my name on it sit on the counter as the staff stood around using very vulgar language and not doing anything. I finally asked if my food was done, and got a no- the plain bagel was not ready. After another few minutes of waiting, I watched as a man with no gloves dropped my sliced bagel into the bag- no box, nothing. Just loose in the bag, falling apart. It was depressing. Don't go here

Because of poor service in the past we have not been back to this location in over two years. We just gave it a try again. We ordered a sandwich for curbside pickup. We followed the instructions in the app and saw that the meal was finished and should be delivered to the car. After waiting a while I went in and saw the bag sitting on the counter by the kitchen. Who knows how long it would take them to bring it to the car. If you're not going to deliver to the car then don't say you will!! Will not be going back!!! Poor service!!!!

This absolutely has to be the worst Panera bread in charlotte. How consistently they screw up electronic orders or can't seem to manage their curbside delivery is beyond explanation. It amazes me how the Panera in ballantyne can get things right like clockwork but the waverly location stumbles all over itself. I'd hold off on pre-tipping electronically.

Food was marked off on bag but wasn't in the bag. Also the large size Mac'N'Cheese was not even a size of a jar of baby food.

Disappointed

Food is good but the drive thru messes up orders more often than not. Make sure you double check you full order in the bag before pulling away, or use their app + curbside instead of drive thru. This location in Waverly has had this problem since opening and it's only getting worse. Poor management..
Very clean and friendly/fast service
I love this place and I come here all the time when I have to meet people for any reason

Panera Bread on Waverly , Charlotte, NC
I had ordered a veggie sandwich, and the sand which came out looking  pretty good, then I saw a tiny insect crawling on the plate , it  crawled inside the sandwich . My friend saw it too.  I took it back & told the employees what I saw. They didn't say anything. I didn't see  my sandwich for a long time , I decided to talk to the manager.. The manager made a lousy sandwich, that it didn't look like the veggie sandwich which it was  missing  cucumbers, &  peppadew pepper , the breads were cold . I asked the manager if it was a veggie sandwich that I had ordered , she said yes. but I told her the sandwich didn't look right. she said can refund me the money., but I told her that wasn't  necessary  A few dollars wasn't the point here, but the point was  she made a lousy sandwich .Also, she offered to re- make the sandwich ,  I turned it down because I didn't want her  spitting in my sandwich.
Service was great!
Food was good
The food was fine, but the ice machine was moldy and disgusting.
Very good

Un buen lugar para desayunar, comer pizza, deliciosos sandwiches, ricas bebidas y muchas mas opciones. El lugar es muy limpio y todo en orden. Cuenta con servicio de drive thru. Los pedidos se despachan rapido, los empleados son amables y atentos a ayudar.

Tienen una muy buena opcion para ordenar desde una tableta con muy buenas fotos y descripcion de los platos, permite facilmente configurar cambios, adiciones y mas; el servicio fue rapido y las instalaciones estaban bastante limpias, quizas fue un poco confuso el tema del localizador ya que pusimos el numero incorrecto y no nos dimos cuenta que el pedido estaba listo a tiempo pero ese no fue un problema del establecimiento, en cuanto a la comida estaba deliciosa!!!
Always great food, the bacon turkey bravo is my favorite sandwich

I've been to this location multiple times as it is close to my work and every time my order is not correct. They don't listen to the modifications on the sandwich, never put a pickle with the sandwiches, and change the side that was requested. The receipt on the bag is correct and contents are not. Very  disappointed.
Me encanto la sopa de brocoli
The bathroom room was soaked from being just mopped but not a single "Wet floor" "Caution" sign anywhere!

Past few times I've been there the sandwiches are so carelessly made. If it wasn't for having a few gift cards I would not spend my money here. Those sandwiches should be 5$ max because there's really not much to it. I'd rather have a CFA sandwich

This is not worth 9$
I ordered a broccoli mac and cheese bread bowl. It barely had any mac and cheese, maybe it's because I got it to go. I was not given an option on my side so they gave me two more pieces of bread with a little bit of mac and cheese or dump it in. I will not be coming back to this location.
It was good but the side of bread was tough and chewy.  I could not eat it . The plastic knife they provided was not strong enough to cut thru it.
At Panera I get my bread. It's made fresh and tastes great. Plus, it's not frozen like in the grocery stores.
This location has excellent curb service. Staff is kind and speedy!

food is fine, however, don't do curb side pick up, you have to wait extra 15 or 20 minutes even on Saturday morning! If you don't want to offer curb side pick up, don't offer it! My food was ready at 7:19, I waited in my car until 7:34 and no one come out to delivery it, I went in to pick up, it was sitting right there!

Sandwiches, Salads, Soups and Desserts are featured.  Curbside pickup available, also drive through.  Very tasty bread (a little too much for the meat served).  Flavorful condiments makes sandwiches extra enjoyable.  Fair prices and parking available, jca
We bought 3 half salads and barely green salad all hard end of salad.  I want a refund  shame on panera's

Good quality food and excellent customer service. Had an issue with our order after we arrived home and I called and spoke with Meghan. She went above and beyond to fix the situation and we greatly appreciated it. Mistakes happen, but good customer service is extremely valuable. Meghan's kindness and helpful attitude will keep us as customers. Thank you.

I will never go to Panera Bread again. My two teenage children were there tonight to eat and hang out with their friends and play some games. Instead of a fun time they were accosted by the manager, like a drill sargent, to put their masks on right after taking a bite of food or drink of water. My kids told me the manager marched around tell people to put their masks back on as soon as their cup was empty or they sat their forks on the plate. This is terrible customer service and not the manager's right. Goodbye Panera Bread...the food is never that good anyways.

I did go here. Their stuff is ok good but my wife and step son like it a lot. We go and sit and talk of world events. They drink coffee.. I have water and contemplate lifes great mysteries. Cold fusion.. Been working on that.. They let me use all the napkins I want to draw out my diagrams. So I'll go there again when they go. I'll figure this out.. Become rich.. Build an Iron man outfit outta kryptonite then take over the planet. Be like the democrats then. I'll persecute and castigate anyone who has a different opinion than mine. Oh yes I dare say I shall. Muahahahaha.. Viva la resistance. Peace out.. Trump two time impeachment champ. 2 an 0 baby. Bet their heads are exploding.. Muahahahaha
Love the drive-through access at this location! Quick, easy, and the food was great!
It's panera. Everyone was wearing masks correctly minus one guy who didn't have it on his nose but someone corrected him, do I can't complain too much

i've had decent experiences in the dine in and drive through but i've had 2 horrible experiences with the curbside pickup. i went to pick up a cookie on my birthday and had to wait 30 minutes in my car after marking "i'm here" on the app. i called the restaurant and nobody answered. i'm very cautious about covid so i sent a friend inside to ask and they had it sitting there waiting with nobody bringing it out. there were other people parked next to be in the curbside delivery spot too but no sign of an employee bringing ot food. when my food was extremely late i never even got any sort of apology. i came again months later and also had to wait 15 minutes in curbside for a bagel that not to mention was sliced horribly and extremely small. panera needs to fix their priorities, we're in a pandemic and not everyone can go inside. fix your curbside pickup!

Coffee was cold. There was no one inside (thanks covid) but the store wasn't even busy with online orders. When I ordered at the minimum I expected a reheated coffee. The workers couldn't even have basic courtesy of heating it in microwave before serving it.
Swift and clean ...
clean, timely service, good coffee
Had a good experience at Panera bread this morning.First time at this location.Service was fast. Staff was friendly and accommodating
Great!

Waited 40 minutes to get a drink order. Inquired with the staff after 20 minutes into the order and was told that kitchen staff would be busy working on other orders when there was no one in the restaurant! This was 10:45am in the morning, so not a rush hour! Did not get the order after 40 minutes and for first time ever, returned an order in a restaurant! Never going back! I did add a tip to the order but I guess I paid it for a nonexistent service.
Love it

Worst location, they cannot fulfill the order right. This has happened third time, we ordered 1/2 dozen bagels sliced and toasted, but they were sliced but not toasted. Also you need to wait near the front desk a minimum of 15 minutes to find someone to take the order
Super nice staff

I am so disappointed by the Panera's at waverly center. How hard is it to check the order before you place it in customers hand at drive through? Ordered twice, got my order wrong both times, the sandwiches with meat when I order Mediterranean veggie and caprese the other time. The manager did not apologize when he finally picked up the call after calling 4 times and asked me to drive 20 minutes one way to get my sandwich. The other time he would hang up on me when I said I want to talk about my order. I will not be eating there again.
Chak is amazing! He deserves a raise!

Only offering a drive through is the worst idea yet.
It's not only hard to order as the employees can barely hear you but we also did not receive one of the soups.
I genuinely like Panera but drive through are the worst.
To be fair, they did put some cookies with the soup I had to return for.

!Make sure to check your order before you leave! This seems to be a common occurrence with Panera Bread (not only at this location).
Sin palabras! Solo vayan.

Wow! I love coming here for the food and to study. The manager is so kind and the food always come out perfect. I just wanted to leave the review since I have never had a bad experience at this Panera!!
Love the Orange scone and mac & cheese
Great service
Very nice,  but after I pulled around to the curbside to wait for  my food,  they didn't give me the drink i paid for and gave me the wrong soup!!!
Love this place and there broccoli cheddar soup is my fans favourite
Had a really fresh and tasty  modern caprese sandwich from this location!

1.prices on drive thru sign is not same as they charge for
2.coffee lead was not attached right and it make my car dirty
3.when you pay 2 times more than other  choices for half sandwich $8.40 you want to see the quality , but it was not even same quality for a 1/2 steak sandwich
4.low quality even on printed paper

Good food 
Thank you
Very pleasant employees!! Excellent service!! Social distancing  and clean!! Thank you !!
Excellent food and service. Do not harass for mask.

The worst Panera location,  by far. Any time I have ever ordered for delivery or drive-thru, my order is completely wrong. Tonight was the 4th time they've messed up my order. The sandwiches were not at all what I ordered,  and I couldn't get staff on the phone.  I'm sticking to the Arboretum location.
I love the fact that they're bribing curbside items on a tray whereas other Panera's are not doing that. Thank you for your kindness and thoughtfulness. Appreciate it!
service was nice but their iced coffee is super watered down. like light light brown and clear. I've ordered twice there and it seems like they're cutting the iced coffee or preparing it incorrectly
Food was good
Been here 3 times. Each time food was good and correct. I had the avocado chicken joint BANGING
Best bagels! Love their oatmeal!

First time using curbside pickup. Some things to keep in mind. If you order online, the notification button for "I'm here" will be on your email. I wasted time installing the app after my order while waiting in parking lot to find it wasn't in the app. Also the complimentary coffee only applies if you pay a subscription. Which is misleading at first glance.
Limited menu but as always great food and service
Why are you guys always out of bread like half the time we go?

Went to drive thru last Saturday at 7 and ordered 3 brioche breakfast sandwiches. All 3 were in my bag but they were Room temp. No grill heat. No microwave. Just cold bread and cold cheese and cold bacon. (Eggs were left off due to allergies)
I think next time I'll ask for toasted brioche sand

VERY inconsistent portion sizes. My wife and I went to the drive through and bought a caesar salad, Thai salad, and 2 soups, total $27. We get home and the salads are TINY. As small as a Wendy's side salad, but for over $10 each. See photos. This must be very poor management to allow salads pass through like this.
My soup was cold , from lobby to car where I opened to drink
Bad drive through experience. Bad management.
I have always been happy here. Good food and service

Well we went through the drive through and all seemed well. When we got to pickup window we were never given the total for our meal just asked for payment. We had to ask for a receipt. But I point blank asked if they had put spoons in the bag for the soup, and the young lady said there were. We looked before we pulled out of the parking lot and there were no spoons. So she lied right to my face and rudely told me good night. So my wife went in and had to ask at the counter for spoons.
Clean, attentive staff, delicious delicacies.
Everyone is so friendly and willing to help. Order wrong? No problem. Got a question? They have an answer. So many choices and options to choose from and don't forget about customization!
Panera @ Waverly is great, service during rush periods is not handled well,  place is super clean friendly and great staff . Great location, very visable from the street, parking can be tight fyi.

The worst Panera bread on earth. If you place a drive-through order and they ask you to pull to the front to bring you your order DO NOT MOVE. Otherwise expect to be waiting for a while and your order to be messed up and cold. It took them 20 min and 3 trials to get 4 bagels, mac&cheese , and souffle order and still couldn't get it right.........I gave up and left. Find you another location
Literally 15 minutes in drive thru to be told they stopped serving at 7pm on a Saturday? Now I am stuck in this line and cant get out.  Apparently the guy ahead of me was lucky enough to get food.

I usually love Panera, but was really disappointed tonight. They were out almost all their desserts, many of the food menu items and then waited 30 mins to have our food ready. I went back and asked the manager, who said they hadn't even started working on our order. Asked for a refund along with others. Frustrating experience along with many other people frustrated and waiting far too long for their food as well.

From the register worker to the food runner, the entire staff was a pleasure to be around. The place was very clean and warm. The food was so yummy. The soup bread bowls- if you eat carbs- are delicious. I was able to get a mug for my coffee, which for some reason always seems to taste better out of a mug. This is a great place to sit and work or relax. Phenomenal pastries baked every day I believe. Will definitely be back.
Good lunch menu.
Always order online and food is always ready on time. Great food!

The food, the service and the prices are all excellent. Books at any Panera including this one AR eager-to-please and go beyond. Now if they would just keep the coffee hot and field in the urns, and replace the honey bears before they are almost empty, it would be perfect.

Panera Bread locations have a great unique niche in the fast / fresh / healthy food segment.  Varied menu and quick turnaround.  The challenge I have is to avoid an extra 1000 calories from the cookies and baked goods.  Love the ice tea selections. The stores keep consistent quality so one location is as good as the next.
